domain.description: The domain associated with the subscription.

quantity.description: The quantity or number of units in the subscription.

email_token.description: Token for email verification linked to the subscription.

cron_expression.description: The cron expression for the subscription billing cycle.

next_payment_date.description: Date for the next payment in the subscription cycle.

open_invoice.description: Status of any open invoice for the subscription.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the subscription was created.

plan.description: Details of the subscription plan chosen.

customer.description: Details of the customer who subscribed.

invoice_limit.description: Limit on the number of invoices for the subscription.

split_code.description: Code for splitting payments associated with the subscription.

payments_count.description: Total count of payments made for the subscription.

most_recent_invoice.description: Details of the most recent invoice related to the subscription.
